author: MSNBC
title: In Puerto Rico, federal and local officials clash over how to exit bankruptcy
description: Puerto Rico’s government and a federal control board overseeing the territory's finances disagreed over how the U.S. territory should exit a contentious bankruptcy.
content:
Puerto Ricos government and a federal control board overseeing the the island's finances disagreed Friday over how the U.S. territory should should exit a lengthy and contentious bankruptcy.
The two… [+2526 chars]
